tools_api.name: WebPD
tools_api.description: WebPd is a highly modular web audio programming toolkit inspired by Pure Data
tools_api.author: Sebastien Piquemal

tools_api.name: RAVE
tools_api.description: Official implementation of RAVE: A variational autoencoder for fast and high-quality neural audio synthesis
tools_api.author: Antoine Caillon

tools_api.name: nn~
tools_api.description: A max / Pd external for real-time AI audio processing.
tools_api.author: Antoine Caillon

tools_api.name: Dicy2
tools_api.description: "Dicy2 for Max" is a package for Max implementing interactive agents using machine-learning to generate musical sequences that can be integrated into musical situations ranging from the production of structured material within a compositional process to the design of autonomous agents for improvised interaction.
tools_api.author: Jérôme Nika, Augustin Muller, Joakim Borg, Matthew Ostrowski

tools_api.name: Spat
tools_api.description: Spat is a software suite for spatialization of sound signals in real-time intended for musical creation, postproduction, and live performances.
tools_api.author: Thibaut Carpentier, Markus Noisternig, Olivier Warusfel

tools_api.name: Soundworks
tools_api.description: Full-stack JavaScript framework for distributed WebAudio and multimedia applications.
tools_api.author: Benjamin Matuszewski

tools_api.name: CoMo Elements
tools_api.description: Mobile webapp to create collectively sound-movement interaction
tools_api.author: Ircam ISMM

tools_api.name: Style Transfer
tools_api.description: Style Transfer is a technique in computer vision and graphics that involves generating a new image by combining the content of one image with the style of another image.
